title: Why Have I Not Got My Season Rewards....
body:
So I Am Silver 4 And Yet I Have Not Gotten My Silver Borders,Icon... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}



Riot Please Fix This

replies.body: They said the last day for ranked rewards to roll out is 11/18. So either you are getting it sometime today or tomorrow, OR you were banned in some way and thus will not receive any ranked rewards.
Read the side of the screen.
